summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3422 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 61, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 5, Supplemental, being the alley between 22nd Avenue North and 23rd Avenue North, from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42448, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
